quote: You killed innocent people. You ask the sea for mercy.
Okay, so we're doing things a little out of order. S*** happens.
Put two ships in the open sea without wind or tide, they will come together.
So, let me get this straight. You do it dressed like a bat? Like an actual bat.
Icebergs in the harbor, four months since the last ship got through.
Dreams make good stories, but everything important happens when we're awake.
You cross swords with the Sardaukar, you know it.
I was beginning to think you were afraid to fight.
I live, I love, I slay, and I am content.
Run from me... and I will tear apart the mountains to find you! I will follow you to Hell!
Every child eventually comes to a bridge that they must cross alone

I have many things I'm sorry for. Many regrets. But I never regret anything that I did for my children.
I heard what you did. Choose any horse you wish, it is yours. I make this gift to you.
I will give him the Iron Chair that his mother's father sat upon. I will give him Seven Kingdoms. I, Drogo, will do this.
